item.title: MIUI OS1.0.5.0.UNAEUXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra EEA

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.5.0.UNAEUXM | 14.0

Size: 8.3 GB

MD5: 9e0ca40ed46fdfd17eb17a097b29929e

Changelog:
[Control center]
View and manage your nearby smart devices in Mi Smart Hub which constantly updates in real-time based on device networking
[Proactive intelligence]
Advanced AI technologies allow devices to assist you proactively (Beta)
A cross-device cognitive center combined with on-device AI algorithm deployment
Xiaomi HyperMind utilizes large foundation models and enables devices to proactively understand your needs and act accordingly
Deep integration of large AI models empowers system apps

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UNACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra China

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UNACNXM | 14.0

Size: 9.3 GB

MD5: fb0e96fd48c01dd880bf782385c0ec0e

Changelog:
[System]
New: Camera grip charging options
New: Vital signs info can be included in messages sent via Tiantong Satellite communications (works with Mi Fitness 3.27.2 or later)
New: Emergency SMS can be sent automatically during satellite calls when Emergency SOS is on
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
Optimization: System stability
[Camera]
Optimization: HDR image quality in some scenes
Optimization: Portrait mode image clarity
Optimization: Face brightness algorithms for average exposure metering option

Download: Here
